ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionChannelTy.name: Communication Subscription Channel Type
ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionChannelTy.description: The Communication Subscription Channel Type DMO represents the engagement channel where a customer can be contacted for a communication subscription.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Communication Subscription Channel Type DMO.

ssot__CommunicationSubscriptionId__c.description: A reference ID to customer’s subscription preferences for a specific communication.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to channel type by which message can be delivered, for example email, phone call, SMS message, or TV advertisement.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.
